description:
Sinking Funds are used by businesses when they need to accumulate a large amount of capital for use at some point in the future. This course will introduce you to sinking funds as savings vehicles with the goal of reaching a certain goal at some future point in time. We will also discuss the details behind the construction of sinking fund schedules.

You will receive a workbook style set of notes to accompany the video lessons. The course will probably take you 1 - 2 days to complete depending on how much time you devote to it. You will take this course is you are interested in seeing a real application of annuities in the business world.
title: 9. Sinking Funds
